reviews.review_msg: Prof. O'Brien is by far one of the best professors in the SFU History Department. She is an incredibly engaging lecturer, supplementing her lectures with music and art. She is also very kind and approachable, always willing to give help to students who ask for it. As for her marking, she has high expectations. A's are attainable,  but require work.

Really good professor. Wasn't an easy course- there was a lot, a lot of readings, and needed to be very prepared for discussion, but an excellant prof still. Very helpful at guiding discussion and fair marking.
